subject: Why
text:
Why do you tell? 
Me something? 
And don't do it 
If you don't want to love me 
Then why are you here? 
Being too good can make 
People run over you 
Why do people lie to you? 
Just to get what they want. 

Every time someone puts 
His or her hands on you its wrong 
And after that they say they love you 
And you made them do it 
Why is it my fault? 
I had did nothing wrong to you 
It's not my fault 
Because you're caught 
In your wicked world
